descriptions.content:
Related Terms

  • hom, ling ga
  • Burning the hom = hom sreg
  • Burning an effigy (hom) of the enemy in a pit (hom khung)
  • Imprisonment = ‘brub pa
  • Imprisoning and then destroying the enemy in a triangular, iron pit (‘brub/brubs khung, lcags sgrom, e sgrom) using an effigy (ling ga, bgegs ling)
  • Curse = brtad ‘jug pa also involves the burial of an effigy

Example Texts

  • Phur pa yang gsang gi spu gri’i drag sreg 
  • Rdo rje phur pa yang gsang srog gi spu gri'i mngon spyod sreg pa hom gyi las rim gdug pa kun sreg 
  • Dpal ldan lha mo’i zhal hom gyi las 
  • Gro lod sreg hom nyer mkho 
  • Gro lod sreg pa hom gyi gzer ka 
  • Gshin rje ki kang dgra brubs
descriptions.title: Destruction Ritual Using an Effigy
